- Small wooden board
- String

9. You can use a string to attach a small object, such as a toy car, to the rubber band handle, and as the can spins, the object will also spin.

10. Be sure to keep the fire source lit and the water level in the can monitored. Once the water has evaporated, the steam engine will stop working.

Few-shot learning (FSL) is one of the key future steps in machine learning and raises a lot of attention. In this paper, we focus on the FSL problem of dialogue understanding, which contains two closely related tasks: intent detection and slot filling.
